price: Akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Ninusuru na watu mafisadi hawa!
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
